H0.text: Which band featured Siobhan Fahey and Marcella Detroit. Bananarama

H1.text: Which band featured Siobhan Fahey and Marcella Detroit. The Bangles

H2.text: Which band featured Siobhan Fahey and Marcella Detroit. The Pretenders

H3.text: Which band featured Siobhan Fahey and Marcella Detroit. Shakespears Sister

A4.text: Shakespears Sister was an alternative pop and rock musical duo that was formed in 1988 by Irish singer-songwriter Siobhan Fahey, a former member of Bananarama. Shakespears Sister was initially a solo act but became a duo by 1989 with the addition of American musician Marcella Detroit.
